content.question: What is the coefficient of <math alttext="x to the ninety ninth power " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>99</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math> in the Maclaurin series for <math alttext="e to the x power, minus, e to the negative x power " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator 1, and denominator 99 factorial, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>99</mn><mo>!</mo></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 2, and denominator 99 factorial, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>99</mn><mo>!</mo></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 2 to the ninety ninth power, and denominator 99 factorial, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>99</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>99</mn><mo>!</mo></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator 2, and denominator 99 factorial, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>99</mn><mo>!</mo></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 10.14: (BC ONLY) Finding Taylor or Maclaurin Series for a Function

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Identify a re-expression of mathematical information presented in a given representation
